flawed_nl_solution:
At the intermediate stop, 58-28=<<58-28=25>>25 students entered the bus before it stopped at the intersection.
40% of the number of students who entered the bus at the intermediate stop is 40/100*25=<<40/100*25=10>>10
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 25. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
